data.message: Is Facebook now asking for photo ID's & or social security numbers?

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Ken. You can confirm that you’ve been contacted by a Facebook representative by asking them to send you an email. Facebook representatives will have an @sales.fb.com, @support.facebook.com or @fb.com email address. All 3 email addresses are valid and only originate from authorized representatives of Facebook. Let us know if there’s anything else we can help you with. Thanks! -Jessica

Thanks here is the reason I asked. It's a post I just saw.{Facebook just checked out a friend of mine. Asked for a photo ID or SS card. She declined and had to set up a new account. I am not sure if its Facebook doing a random check or someone is reporting profiles that don't look like actual names.}
